message: Let's split it fairly. 60 for me, 40 for you.  What do you say?
Let's turn the tables! I'll take 60, you get 40.  Seems fair to me, and it's a chance for you to avoid the inflation bite.
Okay, I'll up my offer a bit.  70 for me, 30 for you.  Let's get this done before the money loses more value!
It seems we're both being stubborn. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any further delays will only hurt us both.
